QueryId._Description: Query ID from which data to be retrived, these query files are placed in 'queries' folder

autoRead._Description: Set true if data should be read immediately after building data source

autoBind._Description: Set false if widget should read from datasource or data argument passed in refreshDataSource method

staticData._Description: If set true it fetches data from query else it fetches data from data source

Template._Description: Template path, it can be either string or a object, if template is registered in templatestore then mention template id as string else create a property 'Path' and set complete path as string

Path._Description: Path for the template in text format

Dependables._Description: It gets data and response from the widget's queryId and calls onDataSourceReady method of widgets which has queryId listed in Queries array and passes the data and response as arguments

Queries._Description: It take Array of strings, each string is a queryId

isDepending._Description: Set true if data for this widget is read by different widget and passed through Dependables query, default value is 'false'

IsDependent._Description: If Set true it does not pass response and data to dependable widget, default value is 'false'

refreshOnBind._Description: Set true if chart should be refreshed after binding data

width._Description: Width of the widget in pixels

height._Description: Height of the widget in pixels

releaseQuery._Description: If set true it delets the corresponding query object in viewModel on call of widget destroy method call, default value is 'false'

Text._Description: Text for the item, it can be fetched from locales folder. It accepts JSON path from where text is to be fetched or normal string

hoverDelay._Description: Time to wait before expanding or collapsing the menuitem when hovered, Time in milliseconds, default value is 500

collapsible._Description: If set true it Displays icon or button to collapse or expand, default value is 'true'

Class._Description: Css Class to be applied to dom element or the particular block

Action._Description: Name of the function which is to be triggered when clicked on it. This function is declared in events folder

accessCode._Description: Access code to mention who have rights to use this option

iconClass._Description: Icon Class from where icon is fetched

refreshAfterCommand._Description: Set true if widget needs to be refreshed after executing method name mentioned in data-command attribute of widget item

messagebarForListViewAndGrid._Description: It creates APMessageBar widget to display messages using 'displayMessage' and 'displayErrors' methods, by default it displays message from Message property in respective Query file

hidebuttontext._Description: Text to be displayed for hide button

customScroll._Description: Set true to enable custom scroll

loadingTemplate._Description: HTML or Template to be displayed while loading the widget

ButtonDOM._Description: Explicitly specify which tag to be used to create this button widget, default tag is 'button'

Attr._Description: Html attributes to be applied to the DOM element

Bindings._Description: Values to be set in data-bind attribute of the current block or element, it takes array of objects

showText._Description: Set true if text should be displayed else set to false

Width._Description: Width of the block starts from 1

Height._Description: Width of the block starts from 1

External._Description: If set false it it loads template from 'Path' attribute but currently not in use, default value is 'false'

enabled._Description: Set true to enable button, default value is 'false'

showTooltip._Description: Set false to disable tooltip, default value is 'true'

iconRequired._Description: If set true it displays the icon, default value is 'true'

extraClass._Description: Additional class to be added to the toolbar item

toolBarButtons._Description: Buttons to be created in tool bar, it takes array of objects, each object is a set of configurations to create a button

IsWidget._Description: If set true it creates a new widget mentioned in the current block, default value is 'false'

submit._Description: If set true it creates a submit Button element, default value is 'false'

customModule._Description: Custom module configuration, this loads only if isWidget is set true

_InnerFields._Note: If both isWidget and submit are set true then isWidget gets preference. If both are false then it uses anchor element

UrlId._Description: Help Url, to where the page should be redirected on click
UrlId._Note: To use this configuration 'Template.Path' has to be set to 'apps/em/content/templates/help/help'

DOM._Description: Specify which HTML element to be used to create 'Block', default element is 'div'

Replace._Description: Set true if content should replace previous content

IsMaster._Description: Set true if the element is a root or master element

FieldsDOM._Description: This is used to specify HTML element for Fields

FieldsClass._Description: This is used to specify class for DOM element for Fields

Fields._Description: Creating field elements to dispaly information [Array of Objects]. default element is span, it can be changed by specifying it in FieldsDOM property

DOM._Description: DOM block element which is to be created, default element is div

Class._Description: Class of the created dom element or the particular block

Attr._Description: Html attributes to be applied to the DOM element

FieldsDOM._Description: This is used to specify DOM element for Fields

FieldsClass._Description: This is used to specify class for DOM element for Fields

Fields._Description: Creating field elements to dispaly information [Array of Objects]. default element is span, it can be changed by specifying it in FieldsDOM property

Bindings._Description: Key value pair which is to be bound in data-bind attribute

BindPath._Description: Binding path from where text is to be fetched in viewModel

Widget._Description: Making dom element into an widget

Type._Description: Specify type of widget to be created

Config._Description: Configuration settings to be applied to Widget

_InnerFields._Note: For more configurations and settings refer CreatingWidget section

Type._Description: If it is set to 'List' it makes Blocks element as 'ul'  else 'div'

Blocks._Description: creating inner elements. It accepts array of [objects(creating element object) or string(path of the javascript file in dna folder which returns the element object)].

BlocksBindings._Description: Values to be set in data-bind attribute of blocks in the current block, it takes array of objects

getBlock._Description: getBlock method is use to get the block id eg 'EMMain' from the ViewModel object and return the values to calling methods

_Arguments.BlockId: Unique id given to the block

getDataFromFields._Description: getDataFromFields method is use to get the data/load the data for the form fields

_Arguments.Fields: this argument contain complete data of the form fields in object form
_Arguments.initialData: initial this arg has to data after method completion oly the nessesary data is assign to this argument

translate._Description: translate method is use to translate the json object to proper string which is to be display in forms and return the value to calling method

_Arguments.Translate: this arg have the json value

getBlock._Description: getBlock fetch the complete element and stores it

_Arguments.id: this arg contain the block id that has to fetch

renderTemplate._Description: renderTemplate method is use to fetch the templates which are used in the form finally return the compile tamplate HTML

_Arguments.TemplateId: Template path or template defined in templateStore
_Arguments.Data: Data which is to be applied in the template

renderTemplateAsync._Description: renderTemplate method is use to fetch the templates in asynchronously which are used in the form finally return the compile tamplate HTML

_Arguments.TemplateId: Template path or template defined in templateStore
_Arguments.Data: Data which is to be applied in the template
_Arguments.callbacks: A object in which success and error callback functions are defined

showAlertKey._Description: showAlertkey method is use to convert the json value to string

_Arguments.key: this arg holds the json value which has to be cobverted to string

showAlert._Description: showAlert method is use to show alertbox

_Arguments.message: this arg holds the data to be display in the alertbox

show._Description: show method is widget method which is use to display waiting animation dot(. . . )

_Arguments.message: it has 1 parameter v can pass or omit the arg

hide._Description: hide is widget method which is use to hide the waiting dot

confirmKey._Description: confirmKey method is use to convert the json value to string

_Arguments.key: this arg holds the json value which has to be converted to string

confirm._Description: Confirm method kind of alertbox for confirming before deleting data

_Arguments.message: message that has to b display in confirm box
_Arguments.buttons: Array of objects, each object is configuration for creating buttons, bu default it creates 'ok' and 'cancel' buttons
_Arguments.actions: The buttons for interacting with the window in array of strings. Predefined values are 'Close', 'Refresh', 'Minimize', and 'Maximize'

route._Description: route method is use to route the control to diffrent file for execution

_Arguments.Route: this arg holds the route file path
_Arguments.Args: this arg will hold the objects

resetQuery._Description: resetQuery method reloads the queary with complete data and obseravable objects

_Arguments.reuseExisting: Boolean value, if set true it loads the existing query, if set false or if query does not exist yet then it creates new query

loadQuery._Description: loadQuery method the load queary with complete data and obseravable objects

_Arguments.createNew: Boolean value, if set false it loads the existing query, if set true or if query does not exist yet then it creates new query

AjaxRequest._Description: AjaxRequest is the method which is use to make ajax call and connecto DB

_Arguments.Querydata: this arg holds the requried data to cennect to DB
_Arguments.callbacks: this arg is function used as callback argument

buildRules._Description: buildRules methods build the rules for the validation and return the rules and its msg

_Arguments.requiredRules: List of validation rules to be applied on the form, this list is a array of strings and each string is rule name defined in 'em/lib/validation/rules.js'

loopAsync._Description: loopAsync is the utility.js library method

getBlockIdFromClassPath._Description: getBlockIdFromClassPath method get the blockid by appending (. and / ect)

APActionCenter._Description: A sliding window or panel on the right corner which displays some controls or user information

Class._Description: CSS Class to be applied to html element and also it uses 'img' element and sets image path

Repeat._Description: CSS Class to be applied to html element and also it uses 'div' element and sets background image, 'Repeat' takes precedence over 'class'

Images._Description: Image path or locales path to get Image path as array of strings. If more than 1 image paths is given then it chooses image randomly

APBreadCrumbs._Description: Widget to display current path for navigation

Attr._Description: Html attributes to be applied to the DOM element

APCSS3Menu._Description: Widget to create Menu, it is generally used under APMainMenu widget

items._Description: Items to be displayed in menu, each item is an object

lockedCls._Description: Css class to be added to menu item if the user doesn't have access to it

href._Description: href link to the menu item

locked._Description: Set true if the menu item is to be locked, default value is false

items._Description: Sub menu items, properties are same as menu items

extraCls._Description: Additional Css class to be added to menu item

openCloseBtnSel._Description: Selector to select expand and collapse button, default value is '.openclose-button'

activeMenuItemClass._Description: Css class for active menu item, default class is 'menu-item-active'

menuSel._Description: Css selector to select menu, default value is '.menu'

itemSel._Description: Css selector to select item in menu, default value is '.menu-item'

expandedClass._Description: Css Class to be added when menu is expanded, default value is 'expanded'

collapsedClass._Description: Css Class to be added when menu is expanded, default value is 'collapsed'

ajaxRequestEnabled._Description: Set true to enable ajax call, default value is 'True'

itemContainer._Description: Specifies DOM element to each item in items container, default value is 'div'

itemsContainer._Description: Specifies DOM element to the items container block, default value is 'div'

itemSelector._Description: Css selector to select all list items, default value is '.CarouselItem'

startingItem._Description: From which end the item should start displaying, default value is 'last'

spacingFactor._Description: Spacing between two items, default value is '1.2'

scalingFactor._Description: Scaling factor to reduce size of visible inactive items, default value is '0.1'

itemPositioning._Description: Position of item, default value is 'absolute'

easing._Description: Easing effects to be applied on Carousel items, default is 'easeInOutCubic'

maximizedClass._Description: Css class to be added if maximized, default value is 'maximized'

defaultTemplate._Description: Template to be displayed if no data is found, value is html string

others._Description: Other Configuration to chart widget, this works only if staticData is set to false

title._Description: Custom title for the chart widget

formatData._Description: Formatting data for chart widget by grouping by Category, this works only if staticData is set to 'false'

preserveFields._Description: These fields will not be modified while formatting data, field names to be given as string of array

categories._Description: Category names as string of array

categoryColors._Description: Colors for corresponding Category as string of array

Config._Note: All other configurations are same as kendoChart. click here for more details

DateFormat._Description: Specify date format, default value is 'dddd d MMMM, yyyy'

TimeFormat._Description: Specify time format, default value is 'hh:mm:ss tt'

ShowDate._Description: Set true if date should be displayed, dafault value is 'false'

ShowTime._Description: Set true if time should be displayed, dafault value is 'true'

ShowUTC._Description: Set true if UTC value should be displayed, dafault value is 'false'

ShowTimeZone._Description: Set true if Time Zone should be displayed, dafault value is 'true'

APDiagram._Description: Widget to create diagrams using kendo diagram

hierarchical._Description: If set true it uses kendo HierarchicalDataSource else it uses kendo DataSource, default value is 'false'

module._Description: Path of js file which returns the object which contains function which returns visual elements

fn._Description: Function name in above module which returns a visual element to render for a given shape

_InnerFields._Note: All other configurations are same as kendoChart shapeDefaults configuration. click here for more details

Config._Note: All other configurations are same as kendoChart. click here for more details

customModules._Description: Custom modules that are created once and used at many places, custom modules are identified by id

id._Description: Unique ID for the custom module

path._Description: Path of the js file where custom module is defined

customModules._Note: Instance of the custom module is created once and stored in view and it is used where ever same module is to be loaded

Messages._Description: Messages to be displayed if any

Class._Description: Css class of the element which displays message

_InnerFields._Note: 'text' property chould be configured in corresponding query file

checkable._Description: If set true it displays text box for selecting rows

isSingletonQuery._Description: If set true and query is already loaded by other widget, then it uses the same query and data to the new widget which is being loaded. If set false and even if query is already loaded by other widget it creates new query with widget ID prefixed to the query ID, default value is 'true'

resetQuery._Description: If set true it resets the query or viewModel, default value is 'false'

statusTracker._Description: Variable or property name to track status

createNewQuery._Description: If set true it creates new query or viewModel even if it is existing, default value is 'false', works only if reset query is set to 'false'

doubleTapExpand._Description: If set true it expands the targeted row on double click, default value is 'true'

-Selector-._Description: jQuery Selector to select element to which custom scrolls are to be applied, use '.k-grid-content' for grid

_InnerFields._Note: Configurations are same as nicescroll. click here for more details

activateButtons._Description: It dispalys the mentioned buttons on toolbar always. It accepts array of strings, string is the action string in toolbar config object

actionFilters._Description: It dispalys the mentioned buttons on toolbar depending on condition specified. It accepts array of objects, each object is a condition for button to display or hide

action._Description: Action name for which condition is to be applied, value should be same as action string in toolbar config object

maxLength._Description: Displays control if selected items are less than maxLength and at least one item is selected

minCount._Description: Minimum number of selected items based on which conditin will be checked

maxCount._Description: Maximum number of selected items based on which conditin will be checked

condition._Description: Condition to be checked between minCount and maxCount properties, default value is 'default'

toolbar._Description: Creating toolbar items. It accepts array of objects

customModule._Description: Defining custom module which can be loaded in extended module

path._Description: Path for js file where custom module is defined

autoOpen._Description: Set true if custom module to be opened when page loads else set to false

extendedToolbarModules._Description: Additional module to ba attached to the grid, each modules is stored as object in extendedToolbarModules array

id._Description: ID for the module, should be same as customModule ID which is to be loaded

rules._Description: extendedToolbarModules form validation Rules to be overridden, array of objects

config._Description: Configuration object of rule, name value pair

Config._Note: All other configurations are same as kendoGrid. click here for more details

Src._Description: Path of the image file, this path can also be localized

dropTarget._Description: If set true it makes the current block as kendoDropTarget, default value is 'false'

dragEnabled._Description: If set true it makes the ListView elements as kendoDraggable, default value is 'false'

uniqueIdField._Description: Key to identity the dragable element, default value is 'uid'

dragEnterClass._Description: Css class to be assigned on drop target when dragabble item enters target, default value is 'drag-hover'

checkable._Description: Set true to track checked state of each item

checkedStateTrackingMember._Description: Attribute name to track checked state of each item

APLogOut._Description: Widget to display logout button, Logic is to be written in events file with same name as 'Name' or 'Class' property value of this widget

overlaySelector._Description: Css selector to select overlay elements for this widget

APMessageBar._Description: Widget to display messages using 'displayMessage' and 'displayErrors' methods

hidebuttontext._Description: Text to be displayed on hide button

APMetroContent._Description: Widget to display details within a block or box

nestedEnabled._Description: If set true it uses jQuery nested plugin, dafault value is 'false'

useFreewall._Description: If set true it uses jQuery freewall plugin, dafault value is 'false'

adjustWidth._Description: If set true it sets width automatically with respect to its parent container, default value is 'false'

dragEnabled._Description: If set true it creates a dragdealer widget, default value is 'true'

autoCenter._Description: If set true it centers the block with respect to its parent block, default value is 'false'

scrollToEnd._Description: If set true it positions the left end of horizontal scroll bar to prescribed position, default value is 'false'

gutter._Description: Vertical and horizon spacing between the row and column, default value is '20'

minWidth._Description: Minimum width for jQuery nested plugin and is equal to cellW for jQuery freeWall plugin, default value is '205'

minHeight._Description: Minimum height for jQuery nested plugin and is equal to cellH for jQuery freeWall plugin, default value is '205'

animate._Description: Set true to make block move with animation, default value is 'false'

customAnimation._Description: Set true to perform custom animation while loading, defalut value is 'true'

selector._Description: Css selector for selecting metrocontentblock, default value is '> .Blocks > .Block'

Config._Note:
nestedEnabled gets preference if both nestedEnabled and useFreewall are set true.
For more configurations of jQuery Nested. click here for more details
For more configurations of jQuery FreeWall click here for more details

APMetroContentBlock._Description: Individual item or block under MetroContent widget

BackgroundImage._Description: Background image class, default value is 'Block11n'

Message._Description: Content to display in the Block

IsPlaintext._Description: If set true it reads only content attribute and displays it else it reads all attributes, default value is 'false'

Title._Description: Title of the block, it can be fetched from locales folder. It accepts JSON path from where text is to be fetched or normal string

Content._Description: Content of the Block, it can be fetched from locales folder. It accepts JSON path from where text is to be fetched or normal string

APMetroContentBlock._Note: This widget can be followed by blocks, refer CreatingElements section for creating blocks

APNav._Description: Widget to create a set of navigation links

Data._Description: Data to create nav widget, it takes array of objects

APPages._Description: Widget to open webpage in iFrame tag element

Url._Description: Source to iframe element, a URL string

idField._Description: Field name in response data to be set as ID

collapseOnSelect._Description: It is an alternative to 'expandMode-single', if set true it collapses currently active item on select event and expands new item

iconClickable._Description: If set true it adds event handler on click of menu icon

expandFirst._Description: If set true it expands the first item in the widget

autoSelectFirst._Description: If set true it selects the first item, default value is 'true'

displayMember._Description: Property in data which is to be displayed

grouping._Description: To group items in response data

key._Description: Property on which data is grouped

Config._Note: All other configurations are same as kendoPanelBar. click here for more details

OpenClass._Description: Css class to be applied to open the menu, default value is 'Opened'

TargetSelector._Description: Css Selector string to select the targeted element, default value is '.ProfileIcon'

Template: Items list to be created in this template

theme._Description: Theme to ba applied to widget

defaultItem._Description: Index of the tab to be opened immediately after loading the widget, by default it opens the last tab

$Toolkey$._Description: Control name or any string can be given in place of '$Toolkey$'

skip._Description: If set true it skips loading control

minTabs._Description: Minimum tabs to be left open, i.e if number of tabs are less than or equal to minTabs, those tabs cannot be closed or removed. Default value is'1'

APSetCulture._Description: Widget to display language options in dropdown list to set culture

Data._Description: Datasource to be set to the listview, it takes array of objects, each object contains 'text' and 'value' fields

Config._Note: All configurations are same as kendoSlider. click here for more details
All configurations are same as kendoSplitter. click here for more details

HasChildren._Description: If set true it inserts the template before blocks container

contentClass._Description: Css class to be assigned to widget content block

defaultContent._Description: String or HTML string to be displayed if there is no data display

contentStatusClass._Description: Css class to be applied if widget contains data, it gets removed if there is no data to display, default value is 'HasContent'

rebindOnRender._Description: If set true it rebinds data after the template or data is rendered

PropPath._Description: Path to store max ticks and passed ticks, default value is 'TickCount'

maxTicks._Description: Number of ticks after which 'stopped' event gets triggered

autoStart._Description: Set true if timer should start automatically,default value is 'true'

interval._Description: interval in milli-seconds, default value is '1000'

self._Description: If set true it skips Bindings attribute, default value is 'false'

activeClassName._Description: Css class name to be applied when selected, default value is 'k-state-active'

groupName._Description: Group name to which button belong to, default value is 'Toggle'
groupName._Note: Only one button can be selected from eachgroup at a time

mode._Description: If the mode is 'radio' the toggle wouldn't work on the element that is already ON, default value is 'toggle'

name._Description: This is not intended to be changed, default value is 'ToggleButton'

containerSel._Description: Css selector for the container within which it selects all Toggle buttons and group it, default container is 'body'

standalone._Description: Set true if the widget is standalone widget, if widget is within another widget like grid or zoomview then set it to false, default value is 'false'

template._Description: Template path for the toolbar template, default path is 'widget/toolbar/toolbar'

EnableButtonsExtender._Description: If set true it creates kendoButtonExtender, default value is 'false'

maxButtons._Description: Maximum number of buttons to be displayed, default value is '2'
maxButtons._Note: This works only if 'EnableButtonsExtender' is set true

Config._Note: To make use of EnableButtonsExtender and maxButtons, changes has to me made in toolbar.js in engine

dropTargetSel._Description: Css selector to select drop target element, default value is ':text'

idField._Description: Field name which has to be set as ID

valueField._Description: Field name from where value has to be fetched, default value is 'value'

editable._Description: Not in use, default value is 'false'

Config._Note: All configurations are same as kendoTreeView. click here for more details

APWaiting._Description: Widget to display animated image and message while loading or waiting
APWaiting._Note: There is no configurations for this widget, use methods such as show, hide to display and hide widget. Refer waiting.js in engine for more methods and its arguments

DataAction._Description: Action to be routed if DataSourceConfig is defined in Config object in Query page or viewModel

APWindow._Description: Widget create popup window to display widget or data

maximize._Description: Set true to maximize window after initialization of widget, dafault value is 'false'

uniqueId._Description: If present it register the window module in objectStore in View

noCenter._Description: If set true the window widget will not be positioned to center, default value is 'false'

MessageType._Description: Set to 'Alert' if using it as alert box, if fetches message from viewModel 'State.Query.Alert'

AutoOpen._Description: Set true to open window after initialization of widget

titlePath._Description: Object Path in viewModel to fetch title for this widget
titlePath._Note: First it checks for 'KeyTitle' in current block object, if not found then it loads query if any and looks for 'Title' in viewModel if not found then it searches in this path in viewModel

Config._Note: All configurations are same as kendoWindow. click here for more details

APWizard._Note: Wizard steps should be written in 'Blocks' array sibling to widget object, each array item is a WizardStep Widget

APWizardStep._Description: Widget create Wizard steps, it is to be written under 'Blocks' array sibling to APWizard widget

animationDuration._Description: Duration of how long the animation will run, dafault value is '250'

StepIndex._Note: WizardStep with StepIndex '0' is loaded first on the APWizard widget, other WizardSteps can be loaded by setting name of the widget in 'data-step-target' attribute of buttons and calling 'next' method in event handler

customModules._Description: Array of Custom module ID created using APForm, it loads each modules under this wizard step

APWizardStep._Note: Wizard contents should be written in 'Blocks' array sibling to APWizardStep widget object

APXmlViewer._Description: Widget to display XML data in tree view, this widget is extension of APTemplatedWidget

APZoomView._Description: Widget to display content in zoomable container

slider._Description: Slider configuration for APZoomView widget, and it is loaded in toolBar block

template._Description: Template path for the slider template, default path is 'widget/zoomview/zoomslider'

defaultContent._Description: Message to be displayed if there is no data display, it can also be path in locales

ToolBar._Description: ToolBar button configuration which was loaded by 'fieldsTemplate', it take array of objects

action._Description: Action name to identify button with data-action attribute assigned to button in 'fieldsTemplate'

fieldsTemplate: Loads the template in toolbar block, it can also be used to load toolbar buttons

ZoomLevel._Description: Zoom level configuration for APZoomView widget

config._Description: Zoom level configuration for APZoomView widget

zoom_animation._Description: Transition Effect for ZoomView, same as transition

base64._Description: If set true it combines the canvas over the image
base64._Note: To use this option 'isCanvas' must be set to true

isCanvas._Description: Set true to create canvas on content of zoonView widget

multiselect._Description: Set true to select multiple objects on widget, default value is 'true'

selectedColor._Description: Color of selector element, default value is 'green'

strictMode._Description: If set true it does not display the status of the process, default value is 'false'

value._Description: Zoom value to be applied when Widget is initialized
